testcase.name: validateUserIsAbleToGetEditProfilePage

failure.message:
Locator expected to have CSS property 'background-color': rgb(14, 186, 197) Received: rgb(255, 255, 255)
Call log: - Locator.expect with timeout 5000ms - waiting for getByText("Edit Account") 3 × locator resolved to <a class="list-group-item" href="https://ecommerce-playground.lambdatest.io/index.php?route=account/edit">…</a> - unexpected value "rgb(255, 255, 255)"
